overview:
Born in 1947, B.sc. in mathematics, computer science and economics. CEO In current position since 2002, employed since 2002.

Jan Nerdal has over 30 years of management experience in sales and marketing, general management and operational management through international IT industry assignments. Most recent positions; General Manager Europe at a division of EMC, General Manager for Northern Europe at Apple Computer, Country Manager of Apple Computer in Sweden and Country Sales Manager computers, test and measurements for Hewlett-Packard Sweden. Jan has worked as a research associate for CERN (European Centre for Nuclear Research)
